home.title: Home

home.subtitle: What is Timtimi?
home.subdescription:
Join teams and do something together!
Timtimi means multiple teams gathered together.

ships.title: Teams
ships.shipDescriptionPlaceholder: What kind of team is this? Please describe briefly
ships.insufficientPermissions: Only Gaia+ users can create teams
ships.transferCaptaincyConfirm: Are you sure you want to transfer captaincy to {name}? You will become a navigator after the transfer.
ships.captainCannotLeave: Captain cannot leave the team. Please transfer captaincy to another navigator first.
ships.memberOnlyMessageNotLoggedIn: This team is for members only. You can log in to join.
ships.memberOnlyMessageLoggedIn: This team is for members only.
ships.errorLoadingShip: An error occurred while loading team information.
ships.errorJoiningShip: An error occurred while joining the team.
ships.confirmLeaveShip: Are you sure you want to leave this team?
ships.errorLeavingShip: An error occurred while leaving the team.
ships.confirmDeleteShip: Are you sure you want to delete this team? This action cannot be undone.
ships.errorDeletingShip: An error occurred while deleting the team.
ships.errorUpdatingShip: An error occurred while updating the team.
ships.confirmRemoveMember: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
ships.errorChangingRole: An error occurred while changing member role.
ships.errorRemovingMember: An error occurred while removing the member.
ships.errorTransferringCaptaincy: An error occurred while transferring captaincy.
ships.errorCreatingShip: An error occurred while creating the team.
ships.requestMessagePlaceholder: Please briefly explain why you want to join (optional)
ships.approvalRequired: This team requires approval for membership
ships.approveRequestConfirm: Are you sure you want to approve this join request?
ships.rejectRequestConfirm: Are you sure you want to reject this join request?
ships.reviewMessagePlaceholder: Please provide a reason for approval/rejection (optional)
ships.confirmDeleteRejectedRequest: Are you sure you want to delete this rejected request? The user will be able to apply again after deletion.
ships.cannotReapplyAfterRejection: Your previous request was rejected. You cannot apply again until the team administrators delete the rejected request.
ships.requestResetToPending: Rejected request has been reset to pending status
